import React,{useContext,useState,useRef,useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"./Navbar.css";import{UserContext}from"../../context/UserContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const{user,logout}=useContext(UserContext);const[showProfileMenu,setShowProfileMenu]=useState(false);const profileRef=useRef();// Close menu if clicked outside
useEffect(()=>{const handleClickOutside=event=>{if(profileRef.current&&!profileRef.current.contains(event.target)){setShowProfileMenu(false);}};document.addEventListener("mousedown",handleClickOutside);return()=>document.removeEventListener("mousedown",handleClickOutside);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-logo",children:"MyPet \uD83D\uDC3E"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-links",children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",className:"nav-links",children:"Register Pet"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/generate-qr",className:"nav-links",children:"Generate QR"})}),!user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",className:"nav-links",children:"Sign Up"})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"nav-item profile-dropdown",ref:profileRef,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"profile-icon",onClick:()=>setShowProfileMenu(!showProfileMenu),children:"\uD83D\uDC64"}),showProfileMenu&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Name:"})," ",user.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Email:"})," ",user.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Phone:"})," ",user.phone]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/update-profile",className:"update-button",children:"Update Profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:logout,className:"logout-button",children:"Logout"})]})]})]})]})});};export default Navbar;
